name: Büyük Doğa Bodurlopu
desc:
A slime that has undergone ecological changes due to abundant Dendro in its environment.
There are some who see it as something similar to the Whopperflowers, hiding its true form to trick and hunt its prey, and some regard it as a slime that has been parasitized by some special plant. From this point of view, might some cultures also see these slimes as having some special medicinal value?

dropMaterial.name: Bodurlop Özü
dropMaterial.desc: A thick coating found on slimes. Most commonly seen material in elemental workshops.

dropMaterial.name: Bodurlop Salgıları
dropMaterial.desc: Mildly purified slime secretions. Harmful to the skin. Please avoid direct exposure.

dropMaterial.name: Yoğun Bodurlop Özü
dropMaterial.desc: Concentrated slime essence. When left alone, it will begin to move on its own.
